about_the_game:
The Adventure Pack contains a whole new adventure for the young diver who is trying to help his mentor Professor Adams unravel an ancient mystery! New mysteries, new puzzles, new challenges, new items, and new achievements await those brave enough to seek them out!

FEATURES:

  • Dead Mines - explore the Wild West in a small town of Calentine while learning some interesting facts about the California Gold Rush period.



  • Sons of Horus - dive and discover what lies inside a hidden temple now enveloped by the Mediterranean Sea.



  • More Challenges - an adventure designed to bring a lot of mystery and tension as you encounter more complex puzzles along your way.
detailed_description:
The Adventure Pack contains a whole new adventure for the young diver who is trying to help his mentor Professor Adams unravel an ancient mystery! New mysteries, new puzzles, new challenges, new items, and new achievements await those brave enough to seek them out!

FEATURES:

  • Dead Mines - explore the Wild West in a small town of Calentine while learning some interesting facts about the California Gold Rush period.



  • Sons of Horus - dive and discover what lies inside a hidden temple now enveloped by the Mediterranean Sea.



  • More Challenges - an adventure designed to bring a lot of mystery and tension as you encounter more complex puzzles along your way.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670, Radeon R9 380 or equivalent with 2GB of video RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: For QHD/4K resolutions: GeForce GTX 1080, Radeon RX Vega with at least 6GB of video memory or equivalent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: SSD for better loading performance

short_description: The Adventure Pack includes two additional, brand new locations for your adventurous soul! Visit the Dead Mines and Sons of Horus to unravel an ancient mystery!
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Korean, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
